ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 100
ygData.msgSnippet: ... under ... true. ... The cave does have an extremely aggressive spellcaster in it. Can t remember class or race. When I was in the cave (at level 13 maybe),
ygData.messageBody:

> Date: Tue, 05 Oct 1999 16:51:38 GMT

> Subject: Re: Hrmm
>
>
> Yes, it IS possible. I went to Halas through level 15 through 18, and I
> learned alot about it. I think there is a high level gnome necromancer
under
> the frozen river in Everfrost, but he attackes everyone on site. He has a
> few skellie cronies too. I never saw him for myself, so it may not be
true.
>
> >Hey guys,
> >
> >If the clue was to look below waves, and before it was stated that a
> >Barbarian Shaman would do the exploring, what about the lake outside of
> >Halas? Has that already been brought up? If need be, I can take my
> >Magician up there and poke around?
> >
> >Xalastile
> >lvl 22 magician
> >xegony

The cave does have an extremely aggressive spellcaster in it. Can't remember
class or race. When I was in the cave (at level 13 maybe), I was just
killing a few ice boned skeletons. Someone said he had killed a level 22
ranger in seconds. Might be tough.

You find the cave by entering the river by a hole in the ice near Megan's
tower. Then swim north (left) until you come to the mountains (if you are a
decent swimmer you will need no artificial breathing). There you will find
the cave.

I might go there myself. Just rarely play any more...


Zaltil [on Innoruuk]
